channel.title: How do u upload to webhost?
channel.description:
well... i've been making a server status page...and i have a Status.php file and i've TRIED to upload on http://000webhost.com... <--- if we cant say that... let me know? cuz ya... .... but i dont know what im doing wrong? or even if im doing anything at all? ... someone help?
Help me with uploading a php file to a webhost then putting it on my site! ... cuz it aint really working for me :(

item.title: How do u upload to webhost?
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

i PMed u the info i think? if u can figure it out … lemme know how becuz i’d luv to make this a known server page… since i’ve gotten google to check out my websites before

lol … i didnt know google sent bots at me and diluted so much? maybe i shouldnt have applied for the google advert so much? … but ya we #1 for the Desolation Scape search on google!!!
w00t
!!! finally on top

alr1te wat exactly have u tried so far?? wat err0rs did it give have u even tried uploahdin yet?

u could give me details to ur 00webhost if u can trust me it shudnt be too hard to upload, u just select file on browse tool and click upload and it shud work ive used 000webhost before !
